CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The blends of PzNDTDTBT or PzNDTDTBO with PC71BM at different weight ratios were used to optimize the device performances , and their J-V curves are shown in Figure 5.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| PC71BM |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. The acronyms PzNDTDTBT, PzNDTDTBO, and PC71BM refer to specific materials used in the paragraph.

Paragraph: The blends of PzNDTDTBT or PzNDTDTBO with PC71BM at different weight ratios were used to optimize the device performances , and their J-V curves are shown in Figure 5.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| Blends of PzNDTDTBT or PzNDTDTBO |
| with PC71BM |
| at different weight ratios |
| were used to optimize the device performances |
| J-V curves |
| of the blends are shown in Figure 5. |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| Blends of PzNDTDTBT or PzNDTDTBO with PC71BM at different weight ratios |
| J-V curves of the blends |
| device performances |

Note: "device performances" can be considered a property of the blends, as it is a measure of how well the blends function as a material in a device.
